reviews.review:
那一天,四个小偷闯入了我家的园子.

他们肆无忌惮,到处偷东西,拆我放在地上的老鼠夹,还乱摸电鸡,搞得园子不得安宁.

我没有办法,就去和他们沟通.

他们居然还跟我玩起了躲猫猫.

这多没意思,他们在调皮了一段时间以后,说想一览我园子的风景,于是我就把他挂在了钩子上,他现在一定能一览美景了呢，又做了一件好事,真是好开心呢.

在和我玩了一段躲猫猫之后,他们可能是摸够了我家的鸡,打算离开这里,哎,你们摸完鸡就走,还没给钱呢，再坐一会啊，我很着急的走向出口,大门已经打开,就当我寂寞的打算回头的时候，却发现他们并没有走,而是在那里等我,好像舍不得我一样.我高兴坏了.我一步冲了过去，给了他们两个一个大大的拥抱.平时锻炼肌肉果然是对的，这下，我家园子的鸡，你们可以摸个够了......

现在,如果还有人想进入我的园子，我会有如静静聆听树叶的沙沙声一般，然后咧齿而笑.

今夜月美,愿君亡

İndirimdeyken alınması gereken en iyi oyun.. Oyunda 1 manyak katil ve 4 survivor var. İnsanların amacı haritadaki 5 tane jeneratörü çalıştırıp mekanik kapıyı açıp kaçmak. Katilin görevi ise onları yakalayıp bir kancaya asıp ölümlerini beklemek. Oyun çok güzel bir gerilim ve heyecan hissi veriyor. Katilin size yakın olduğunu artan kalp atış sesinizle anlıyorsunuz. Dolap gibi yerlere girip saklanabilirsiniz. Oyunda skill ağacı ve item bölümleri var. Çok güzel ve eğlenceli bir oyun. Arkadaşlarınızla beraber oyunu adığınızda tadına doyum olmaz :)

Finally start game after buying, load up, get into first match, level one, playing wraith. Am happy, will be sneaky. Survivors pop in, all level 15-20. Well, fuck me, time to lose with dignity. First guy down, take to hook, hook him...fuck it, I'm scum, I need the points, camp and kill. Repeat with second guy, but third guy begins saving him...IN FRONT OF ME OVER AND OVER. Okay, this shit won't stand. Hunt them all down, kill them, only one left, he plays ring around the rosey in a house with 4 windows for 20 minutes, finally catch him, enjoy him dying, savor it. Clean sweep, feeling good. Next round, need to recharge my Karma, hunt down survivors as Wraith, begin furiously dinging cow bell. Survivors confused. Pin survivor to wall, ding furiously, let her go. 

She seemes confused, I pin another guy to a wall, ding furiously, let him go, conrtinue chasing and dinging. One guy hides in box, yank him out, realize I accidentally put him into bleeding out, rush off carrying him past 3 hooks, he seems confused, drop him in front of two guys, they run away, I ding furiously, pointing at man bleeding out. Pick him up, chase them to open exit, toss him at them, ding madly. 

They bandage him up, I ding happily. Bandaged guy runs back in as the other two leave, me and him skip through the fields with him dropping barracades and me smashing them marrily like a child at daycare. Eventually, out of barricades, I walk him to exit, wave sadly, ding for him to come back to my amusement park next year, fade from sight. Sad music plays (me dinging) credits roll, he leaves. 

Karma at max

100/10 would ding at people angrilly again.

This game really scratches the itch where I can really try to hide from my enemy, where making little noises matter, not leaving trails, or just managing my time and maneuvers in a way that keeps me alive just a little longer. This game is gruesome, albeit tiring when you're spent after all the adrenaline.

Just needs more content, but for $15? Yeah, I'm sold. I wouldn't have spent a dime though if the devs weren't actively patching and working on more features/content. It's good, but not really a full package release in its current state.

This game is like a shot to nostalgia.  I grew up watching old 80s horror movies, this game despite its initial simplicity, has lore that is a throwback to those times.  It requires teamplay and despite the fact that I've only managed to escape from the assassin only once so far, I've had a blast every single time.

+ Extremamente divertido de se jogar sozinho e em grupo
+ Assassinos divertidos
+ Sobreviventes com habilidades únicas bastante uteis
+ Vale extremamente a pena comprar ele
- O único ponto negativo do jogo é que ele ainda possui alguns bugs, mas nada que afete sua diversão.

A really good game if you are a left 4 dead fan. Really intense.
I like the way that you are playing for progression also. Each match gives an incentive to keep on playing. You earn bloodpoints to spent on the bloodweb, this way you earn new perks, items and add-ons.

No party system yet, aside from private lobbies. But, devs have stated that after release a group mode will be made.
Looking forward to that!

This is a no brainer guys. A must have in your steam library.
why not make a mode like survive with your friend?

Dead by Daylight is split into two playerbases mostly, killer and survivor. If you're competitive and play survivor, the game will be great at all ranks when you're skilled enough. If you're competitive and play killer, the game will be great for the first 15 ranks, and after that each match is a toss up. If you're not playing specific killers, or you run into SWF groups you're at a heavy disadvantage despite occupying the role with 4x the power. On both sides of the spectrum, there are plenty of frustrating bugs that the developers can never get a grip on. Running this game is intensive on the PC even at the lowest settings. To add insult to injury with lowered graphics settings you put yourself at a significant disadvantage due to the blurriness. As survivor you'll bump into doodads more often, as killer it means having people disappear off your screen if they run into you and spin. The game has multiple balance issues, and their developer team seems to lack the creativity, ability, and/or will to put the game in a good spot. If asymmetrical horror is your thing, this game will only satisfy you for a couple days. If competitive cat v. mouse is what you're looking for, this game will deliver up until the highest ranks, before becoming frustrating most of the time.

Excellent & fun game that delivers a continous sense of fear and panic as a survivor. (Fixing generators is nerve wracking  even after 16 hours of game time.) Yeah there's a few "bugs" if you even want to call them that, but the devs seem to be on top of it. Recommended for people who like spooky-scary survival-horror & PVP rolled into one.

Значит так, маньячело поймал двух наших и отправил в "космос", мы с другим товарищем пошли зажигать последний генератор.Зажгли и разбежались по разным "открывашкам", как вижу, летит на меня этот ненормальный с заточкой и пыркает ,я давай перепрыгивать через всякое говно, прыгали так минуты 3.Все таки повалил он меня на землю, я думаю всё кирдык мне, и вижу что вокруг меня бегает и поднять то не может(может баг может он с жертвой игрался, я хз). Я почти дополз до выхода как вдруг, кончается хп ,я подыхаю,мой товарищ смывается.Весело короче.
Das Spiel ist der Hammer. Gruselige Atmosphäre und ein sehr bedrückendes Gefühl beim Spielen. Die Entwickler habens drauf.

Old Review:
I was going to refund this game because the features I was told will be in game never came when the game released. Even with the devs knowing full well weeks before the release of the game, the ability to invite your friend to a game other then private was never added.

I love to progress in games, it means that you get better at it with tools you can use. When you play private, sure, you can play with your friend(s) but you do not level or gain anything in return.

The problem with playing a private game means that if you only have one other friend to play the game with, one of you will be the monster and the other a surviver, you cannot open the game to public or invite others not in your friends list. This means that out of the 4 survivers that could be on the map you play by yourself.

If you want to play with friend and progress, you have to play the loby game, you enter and exit depending if your friend is in there or not.

I cannot speak for everyone, others who play this game think that the game would be easy or unfair if friends talked over the internet allowing them to communicate where the monster is... I've played the game with 2 other friends, 1 other surviver and the monster, from this experience I can say that we ether won with most of us dead or all dead, rarely we all survived, comunication did us little good except when we had to run, which still eneded up with one of us dead, we never took advantage of hopping windows like crayze.

Its been a few weeks now since the game has released and the survivers life has gotten even harder. You still cant play with friends and progress however.

This game is worth it if you like:
-Intense gameplay
-A little horror
-Teamwork
-Screw over your friends
-Killing others and break their dream
-Upgrading characters and get better
This might be the game for you! I personally enjoy the intense feeling and the rush you get when you escape and juke the killer.
4 outta 5 stars!

The game really "hooked" me in...

Dead by Daylight is one of the most entertaining online experiences I've had in a long while.  I honestly can't remember the last multiplayer game that kept me so engaged that it kept me hooked in all my spare time.

This game is a 4 v 1 assymetrical horror game, which is a fancy way of saying there's four people trying not be killed by a very dangerous and scary bad guy.  The four players must work together in order to survive, powering up enough generators to get power to the exit, then make their escape, all the while hiding or evading the menacing killer.   Meanwhile, the one player on the other team has only one goal, to hunt down those survivors and make their lives as painful (And short) as possible, using a variety of weapons and tools at their disposal in order to bring them down before hanging them on meat hooks as a sacrifice.  When a survivor is caught, he can be rescued by the more courageous of his team mates.  Or, for the more cowardly, the sacrifice provides them more time to get objectives accomplished and escape.

The game is incredibly fun, both for the survivors and the killer, depending on which you prefer.  Personally, I ADORE the Killer, yet I'm amazed at how many players prefer playing as the Survivor.  I think it goes to show how well the game is fundamentally balanced, the fact that both roles can be so enjoyable.  Seems to depend a lot on taste.  And there's a bit of luck as well, as the location of objectives on each map is randomized, and sometimes their placement, as well as the spawn of the players, seems a little more convenient for one side or the other, which can influence which way the game goes from an early stage.

The game DOES have it's share of issues at this time.  Survivors can use some fairly cheap tactics to keep the killer at bay, such as hopping back and forth through a window, preventing the killer from ever laying a hand on him/her.  The ranking system is, in my personal opinion, not terribly well thought out, and there's people who like to disconnect before they die in order to prevent themselves from losing any rank, which, often times, hurts their team mates more than it does the killer, as he immediately has one less person to worry about.  Some killers, once catching someone and hanging them on a hook, choose to simply camp and ensure that person's death rather than try and deal with the other survivors, which is REALLY unpleasant for that survivor, especially if he/she is caught early on.  There's a variety of balancing issues, as some killers (Namely the wraith) are a lot easier to play and make WAY more points than others.  Perhaps the most glaring omission of all is the lack of an option to join an online game with a friend or party up, though the developers have made it clear that that's coming.

The game could use a bit more polish, and there's only a handful of maps at the moment.  And it would be great to see more playable killers and survivors.  It can be frustrating dealing with some of the glitches, issues, and exploits that some players take advantage of.  And yet, despite it all, I can't pull myself away from the game.  The core concept of this game is absolutely brilliant, and overall, the game is amazing and I can't recommend it enough.  And there's simply not enough games like it out there.  And the price is very reasonable, I think, for what you're getting.  Despite the flaws, most of which I suspect will be addressed in the coming weeks, the game is an undeniable pleasure for me to partake in.  There's simply so much satisfaction to be found in charging across a corn field with a chainsaw right into a panicking survivor, cutting him down before he even knows you're there.  And there's also nothing like the exhilaration of escaping the killing grounds alive as a survivor.

My final thoughts are this.  If you want a more polished experience, want to play with your friends online, or are at all hesitant about playing this game for various issues that players have raised, wait for a while.  Most of these issues WILL be addressed with time.  And if this game sounds like it was made just for you, jump right in!  I think you'll have a good time.  It's a horror game like no other, whether you're trying to survive it or MAKE it.

Heartily recommended!

Ужасная оптимизация, ужасное отношение к игрокам (игра сырая, что даже на альфа не тянет), зато релизнутая. Разработчики хотят доить игроков, а не работать над багами и нововведениями, И у них это ОТЛИЧНО получается. В лобби нельзя приглашать друзей, приходится по сто раз заходить-выходить из лобби, чтобы встретиться с другом. Как итог, если хочешь поиграть с друзьями, ищете друг-друга в лобби (от 5мин до 30, там как повезёт) играете 10 минут. И по новой. Не исключено, что когда встретитесь, хост ливнёт.
Покупать не советую, даже со скидкой не тянет на то, что вы получите взамен. Её красная цена 100-150р.
Когда "допилят" может и интересно будет, пока, к сожалению, хороших эмоций она почти не вызывает.
Читал, что разработчики хотят ещё платные длс вводить...а зная этого издателя, тут начнётся не только дойка игроков, но и дойка игры, что в ней бесплатного ничего и не останется, кроме того, что мы видим сейчас. Вообщем, светлое будущее ей вряд ли обеспечено. А жаль..
игра отвратительная просто разработчики чхали на сохранения и на баги абсолютно сырая игра писал им сказали что исправили баг с save game error но на деле ничего

Excellent jeu, j'ai rarement eu aussi peur sur un jeu et ça c'est très bien. Le sentiment d'impuissance face au tueurs est vraiment bien fichu, a deux doigts de faire transpercer le "Z" de mon clavier tellement j'appuis fort dessus quand je suis pourchassé (si je vous jure ça fait courir plus vite).
En revanche je ne conseille pas le jeu en l'état.
il y a un système de ranking qui gache tout le jeu (on perd ses rangs perdant) du coup des que les joueurs sont sur le point de perdre = ALT+F4. La déco est instantanée et aucun malus pour ces gens qui ne jouent que pour garder un rang qu'ils ne méritent pas.

En tueur par exemple il faut accrocher les joueurs qui tentent de survivre a des gros crochet pour les tuer et marquer les points et pour l'instant (et je n'exagere pas) 100% des joueurs que j'ai réussi a accrocher ont utilisés ALT+F4.

Une fois que ce soucis aura été réglé je donnerais une bvonne note a ce très bon jeu qui a un énorme potentiel de fun et de trouille.

*See's New update*
"oh boy, this update must have party mode"
*opens dead by daylight*
*see's theres no party mode*
*rolls over and cries*

But seriously the amount of money they would make if they just threw out a party mode, would be insane. everyone would tell there friends to get it then they would tell there friends and so on. Its extremely  frusturating having to try and q at the same time as my friend just to get into a game ( works every 1/1000000 time btw ). But in conclusion i will give this game a positive review when theres party mode. personally to me this game was made to play with friends and to not have party mode at launch is unbelievable.

Раньше на раннем доступе я был категоричен и писал, что игра хрень, т.к. нет: баланса, баги, лаги, нет многого. После выхода я сменил точку зрения в положительную сторону т.к. играть за выжившего стало сложно, но возможно. Теперь меня возмущает то что разработчики не фиксят баги, а выпускают новые платные ДЛС, ради того чтоб срубить бабло. Да они работают над игрой, но меня бесит, что они переходят из крайности в крайность (то понерфят маньяка, то выживших), а основные баги не исправляют. То Траппер на люк поставил капкан то вообще парящий в воздухе капкан встретишь. Я не говорю, что маньяк за четыре метра в жбан ломит, или то что персонажи 45 летние курильщики бегают как беременные с порогом сердца, в отличии маньяков пехотинцев. Я не прошу многого, а требую баланса и исправления багов. Новые ДЛС это хорошо, но это только пополняет коллекцию багов. Помимо прочего добра я не упомянул о бесполезном античите и читерах, на которых вообще разрабы ложили. 
Вердикт: 1. Да я буду играть и покупать ДЛС 2. Игра с многообещающим будущим 3. Удивляет что нет маньяка, который метал бы что-либо (Стулья, топоры, грязь, ДЕШОВЫЕ ШУТКИ) да бы убить и того не добитых калек.
7/10 купить игру стоит, но рейтинг такой поскольку: баги, читаки, баланс портит всё.
Всем спасибо.

Накуканивать людей что может быть лучше. 
10 капканов из 10  ((╬◣﹏◢))

An sich ein gutes und lustiges Spiel...aber, im Moment einfach noch nicht fertig und mit zu vielen Kinderkrankheiten....
Der fehlende Modus in dem man zusammen mit Freunden online spielen kann fehlt einfach und macht das Spiel schonmal (aus meiner Sicht) schlechter......dann kommen eine menge Bugs dazu ...und das was am meistens stört sind die updates...nachdem heute das Update runtergeladen wurden , war es mir nicht mehr möglich auch nur ein einziges Spiel zu absolvieren -.- 
Immer wenn ich in einer Lobby war, alle Spieler auf bereit geklickt hatten und der Countdown zum Spielstart hätte kommen müssen, wurde ich wieder aus der Lobby in den Startbilschirm zurückgesetzt ....was echt mega nervt ! -.-
Also das Spiel an sich ist gut und macht Spaß ...aber Leute ganz ehrlich wartet lieber noch bis es wirklich ordentlich funktioniert und gebt dann das Geld dafür aus ! ;)

If you cant decide if you want to buy this game, just ask yourself this simple question: How much do you like waiting in a lobby. If thats what you love to do in your free time, then go ahead and buy this game, if not, find 4 friends to play with so you dont have to wait.

This game is fun if you get to a match. (only the lucky ones make it!!)

Also - you cant change mouse sensitivity in game :(((

I will give positive review once they fix the matchmaking. If you are in "survive with friends" lobby and there is only two of you. There is super low chance of you getting into a game

This game is not worth its price at this stage.

It's fun. The online system sucks a little, a lot of connection problems. But the game itself is very good. Could use some extra content in the near future, though

I totally recommend this game, started with a few bugs, but nearly all were fixed last patch. A great survival game. This game is hugely growing up on players. So as i expected.  100% Should be bought. If you don't like survival type of games, give this game a try and your idea will change instantly. Its just amazing. Have fun on the game, if you don't like it, give the game another chance and play it again. You will like it for sure.

I have another account with 1.5k hours.  I lost all my data and had to create a new account..... This game is not worth buying.  Not just because of some bugs but how the devs operate.  They clearly lack development knowledge and I feel they hired them off freelancer or craigslist.  They don't care about the community or listen to feedback.  It's all about the $.  In one of their streams they said they haven't had to put ANY overtime into this game!  Even when there was game breaking exploits, delayed patches (waited over 3-4 months for it to come out when it was promised) and players unable to play due to freezes!  They still didn't put the effort or time into fixing their game.  Don't buy it!
Je rectifie, je kiff le jeu, j'attend du contenu en +, et les matchmaking on été améliorer. TOujours pas lassé du jeu.

I have had Dead By Daylight  since the beta was first released. There are some good and some bad points. The game consisits of lobby hopping until you find your friends or a high ranking person, get chassed by a creepy killer and poop your pants, escape (or die.......) (ok ok ok mostly die) and then try to find your friends again. I would definitely recomend this game. Its so much fun and its a horror game that will keep you on your toes.

Мне понравилось! 10/10 ливающих говноедов! В этой игре твой тиммейт, бегающий строго по прямой и не смотрящий назад может ливнуть после пары топоров по YOBAлу, тебя может закемпить Биба за то, что ты отфлексил от него все 5 генов и тд.
+ы:
Атмосферно. Первые 2 ч играл на адреналине, до того держит.
Реиграбельно. Уровень каждый раз регенится по-новому, к тому же каждое обновление выходит еще одна карта.
Интересно. Я наиграл за 4 дня 20 ч, мне стыдно(нет).
Возможность на себе ощутить тяготы героев из фильмов ужасов.
Разнообразие геймплея (на манах)- тут тебе и маневренный Билли, и медленная старушка Хага, и скрытные сталкеры-Маерс и Крик. Можно скользить и найти выйти (олды здесь?) с друзьяшками (но ты лох, пидор, нет друзей). У игры неплохой потенциал, если ее не изговняют кучей платных длс ,как деньзарплаты 2(привет, Starbreeze). ЗЫЖ. Куча платных Длс, но все ключевые персонажи с мастхев перками бесплатны (кроме БиЧа и руины)

Nur bitte fügt eine Option hinzu, dass man das Heilen von Verbündeten abbrechen kann. Deswegen gerade gestorben, großes Danke an MATTY ?$%!
